name: Unit 5 - Fantasy Family Farm
description: 關於 Fantasy Family Farm 的閱讀理解問答
creator: 系統預置

questions.question: Who is the 'very special guest'? Why is he/she special?
questions.answer: Jenny Leung is the 'very special guest' because she's the 10,000th visitor.

questions.question: What will Jenny get from the farm?
questions.answer: She'll get free entry to the farm for the rest of her life.

questions.question: What does Jenny like doing on the farm most?
questions.answer: She likes making candles on the farm most.

questions.question: Which two active activities would you like to try at Fantasy Family Farm?
questions.answer: I would like to try playing golf and making soap at Fantasy Family Farm.
